page.title: 18 MY HOBBY
page.content: My name is Michael and I am in charge of the computer while the rest of the class feeds in the information that they have collected.I like this job because I have got my own computer and I like typing in more or less anything at home.I usually type in games from a computer book or I like trying to make them up myself and fiddle around with them.I usually get my magazines from Barnstaple when I go shopping because the computer facilites in Ilfracombe are poor.I think computers are very handy if you are a business man and have lots of files to look at. I would like to invent a small box to fit on to a computer so that the blind can use it.It could have a microphone so that whatever you say the computer will talk to you.You would also be able to get ones that translate into different languages.
